Detailed Description

Class create to make possible the creation of code instrumentation of executions.

It receive the messages of enter methods and leave methods, into what object, of what class and, based into this informations, create a xmlSequence object.

The xml sequence object created, can be used for many ways, since create a xml, create a diagram file, etc.

Todo:
make filter methods to reduce the diagram of big executions
See also:
CodeInstrumentationMethod

CodeInstrumentationClass

Author:
Thiago Henrique Ramos da Mata <thiago.henrique.mata@gmail.com>

onEnterMethod ( $  uid,
$  strClassDefinition,
$  strMethod,
$  arrArguments 
)

Receive a message of enter into some method and append it as a xml sequence message into the xml sequence object, creating if necessary the xml sequence actor

1. get the name of method as the diagram standart 2. get the namespace name 3. get the actor what the message is bring from 4. get the actor what the message is bring to 4.1 create the actor to if he not exists 5. create the message 5.1 set the message attributes 5.2 set the message values 6. append the message

Parameters:
string $uid
string $strClassDefinition
string $strMethod
Array $arrArguments
Returns:
CodeInstrumentationReceiver me

00294     {
00295         // 1. get the name of method as the diagram standart //
00296         $strClass               = CorujaClassManipulation::getClassNameFromClassDefinition( $strClassDefinition );
00297         $arrMethod      = explode( "::" , $strMethod );
00298         $strMethod              = array_pop( $arrMethod );

00304         if( ! array_key_exists( $strClass, $this->arrClasses ) )

00306             $this->arrClasses[ $strClass ] = 0;
00307         }

00310         $objActorFrom = current( $this->arrStack );

00316             $this->arrClasses[ $strClass ]++;

00319             $objActorTo->setClassName($strClass);

00321             $objActorTo->setId(sizeof( $this->arrActors ) + 1  );

00323             $this->objXmlSequence->addActor($objActorTo);
00324         }

00327             $objActorTo = $this->arrActors[ $uid ];
00328         }
00329

00334         $objMessage->setText( $strMethod );
00335         $objMessage->setActorFrom( $objActorFrom );

00338         
00339         // 5.2 set the message values //
00340         foreach( $arrArguments as $strName => $mixValue )
00341         {
00342             $objValue = new XmlSequenceValue();
00343             $objValue->setName( '[' . $strName  . ']');
00344             $objValue->setValue( serialize( $mixValue ) );
00345             $objMessage->addValue( $objValue );
00346         }
00347         $objMessage->setTimeStart( microtime( true ) );
00348         
00349         // 6. append the message  //
00350         $this->objXmlSequence->addMessage( $objMessage );
00351 
00352         $this->arrMessages[]    = $objMessage;
00353         array_unshift( $this->arrStack , $objActorTo );
00354 
00355         return $this;
00356     }

renameMethod ( $  strMethod  ) 

Rename the method to which they are in accordance with the standarts of the diagram

1. if __construct replace by <<create>> 2. if __destruct replace by <<destroy>> 3. other cases should append the "()"

Parameters:
string $strMethod old method name
Returns:
string new method name

restart (  ) 

Clean the attributes of the xml sequence existing

1. clean actors 2. clean classes 3. clean messages 4. clean stack 5. clean object xml sequence 6. restart the receiver

Returns:
CodeInstrumentationReceiver
